entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
